body:
This appears to be an easy fix, but I suspect the issue appears when there are no previously loaded recipes/actions and I haven't wiped my DB to test this out.

However, the fix should be as simple as changing from `value={action.get('id').toString(10)}` to `value={action.get('id', '').toString(10)}`

body_html:
This appears to be an easy fix, but I suspect the issue appears when there are no previously loaded recipes/actions and I haven't wiped my DB to test this out.

However, the fix should be as simple as changing from value={action.get('id').toString(10)} to value={action.get('id', '').toString(10)}
